name.ja: <ruby>剛<rt>ごう</rt></ruby><ruby>鬼<rt>き</rt></ruby>マシン・スープレックス
name.zh-CN: 刚鬼 魔神・过肩摔霸王龙

text.en: You can reveal this card and 1 "Gouki" monster in your hand; Special Summon both, but you cannot Special Summon, except "Gouki" monsters, while you control either of those face-up monsters. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can add 1 "Gouki" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Gouki Mashin Suprex". You can only use each effect of "Gouki Mashin Suprex" once per turn.
